name: Super Laser Robot - Mirror
description:
Controls (Because i had no time to include a Tutorial):

AWSD - Move, Jump, Crouch;

Spacebar - Alt. Jump;

E - Use Chrono Charge (Slow Down/Speed Up Time)

Mouse - Draw Terrain (Only available when chrono charge is in use)

R - Restart Level

------------------

You are a Robot Quality Assurance Technician, Your job is making sure that each Super Laser Robot that gets out of this factory is worthy of the Company's seal of approval by beating the clock to the finish button!

Use the Robot's awesome Chrono Charge Laser to slow down time and build terrain to help you reach the button faster!

Have Fun!

-------------------

My first Unity Game! Made for the Begginers Circle Jam #4 by Angry Smile.

It started as a American Ninja Warrior Inspired Platformer but it doesn't look anything like it right now.

We only had 2 weeks to develop it and it shows! It's Barely Playable. If you find a bug please let me know so i can add it to the Huge List i already have :P

The Game only has 2 levels at the moment,  we will  add more levels and mechanics when we have time.

Thanks!
